Text: e stari zasto ovo sluzi mislim znam da ima veze sa hl2 ako mozes malo objasniti bio bi zahvalan :)

If you want to use Source SDK Tools and Hummer editor to make maps for source engine i suggest you to download PacSteam Client form http://pacsteam.org/ and instal that, then you need to put gcf files in SteamApps folder and you can run Source SDK from PacSteam
Download PacSteam from http://pacsteam.org/ and put gcf files in SteamApp folder then you can run Source SDK and hummer editor
